headline: Jim Cramer Says “Ford is the Biggest Winner” in Light Auto Tariff News
summary: Ford Motor Company (NYSE:F) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer shed light on. During the episode, Cramer discussed the company in light of the auto tariffs. He said: “I believe these auto tariffs are real. They’ll change the landscape even if Japan and Korea start putting in giant orders for natural gas turbines […]

headline: Jim Cramer Says “GM’s a Winner From These Tariffs Too”
